title: And a vision appeared unto them of a great profit: evidence of self-deception among the self-employed
abstract: Evidence is presented that the self-employed expect better financial outcomes than do employees but experience worse realisations. This is consistent with theories that entrepreneurship is driven by unrealistic optimism
